content: The Father of Stones is a large, black creature clutching a skeleton like a doll. He can be found lurking in the Flaming Mountains just past the Heart of Ember Keeper's Shrine. You will walk straight into his path as you progress further up the mountain, so don't worry about accidentally missing him.
promot:

The content is as follows:
The Father of Stones is a large, black creature clutching a skeleton like a doll. He can be found lurking in the Flaming Mountains just past the Heart of Ember Keeper's Shrine. You will walk straight into his path as you progress further up the mountain, so don't worry about accidentally missing him.
